name: Hedgewars Drawn Map File
summary: Learn about .HWMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Drawn maps can be created by choosing a multiplayer game, clicking on the map preview box, and then drawing with the provided pencil tool. Click the Save button to save the map and the Load button to load it.

description: Map file created by Hedgewars, a free turn-based strategy game similar to the Worms series; stores a hand-drawn map that is created using the in-game editor; used for saving custom user generated maps.
